content:
RTJ may refer to:

Rivera Triple Junction, a geologic triple junction located on the seafloor of the Pacific Ocean southeast of the southern tip of the Baja California Peninsula
Rodrigues Triple Junction, a geologic triple junction in the southern Indian Ocean
Robert Trent Jones Golf Club, a private golf club in Gainesville, Virginia
Ring Type Joint, a type of plumbing joint
Run the Jewels, an American hip hop duo consisting of Killer Mike and El-P
